superpowers.name: Yaka Arrow
superpowers.description: Enhanced accuracy and control when directing arrows through a whistle.

superpowers.name: Whistle Control
superpowers.description: Using the special whistle to control his arrows and communicate with his team.

superpowers.name: Predator Instinct
superpowers.description: Heightened senses allowing for tracking and hunting of targets easily.

superpowers.name: Ravager Abilities
superpowers.description: Capable of advanced combat tactics and strategies learned from being a Ravager.
